page.title: 02The marina
page.content: { { {Recreation:The Marina { The Marina was opened by Princess {Anne and covers three hundred {acres,seventy six of which are taken {up by the actual lake which is half {sea water and half fresh water. It is {artificially built off the Mersey {Estuary with 2 hard concrete jetties. { Some of the Marina facilities {include Sailing Schools for the public {and a Scout and Guide Club which is {very profitable and valuable to the {Marina.The Marina is open at the same {hours as the Marine Park i.e.eight {o'clock in the morning until one hour {before sunset.There are 125 members of {the Sailing Club and the average age {is thirty years.Near the lake is a {shop called Ship Shape and the owner {gives a lot of advice to beginners.
